site_description: This is an example of a bilingual website in English.
hero_paragraf: I'm a student FullStack online school GOIT, but have some projects in my portfolio.
about_text: Welcome to my portfolio site! My name is Roman, and I'm currently learning developer skills to apply them to app/website development. Creative expression is what inspires me, and I'm always open to new opportunities.
about_text-tools: Here are a few tools I’ve been working with recently:
projects_ekotote_dscrpt: Light aversome site - handbag sales landing page (frontend only). First student team project (team role - team lead). HTML/CSS, Flexbox, adaptive.
projects_booksy_dscrpt: The site is dedicated to books. Second student team project (team role - team lead). HTML/CSS & JavaScript, adaptive, API, bundler Vite, libraries.
projects_searchrello_dscrpt: Аpplication for searching images by keywords. Free photos from Pixabay. JavaScript, API, bundler Vite.
projects_webstudio_dscrpt: Individual project of the HTML/CSS module of the Fullstack course. Landing page for a web studio. Mobile-first approach, adaptive, image optimization (including Retina).
projects_notary_dscrpt: Multi-page website of a private notary. Individual project, was started in 2011. Clear HTML/CSS & JavaScript, Flexbox, CEO.
projects_smartorange_dscrpt: Test task for the employer. landing page of a construction company. HTML/CSS, JavaScript libraries, API.
